web.ser
Class ShowRequestHeaders

java.lang.Object

      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          web.ser.ShowRequestHeaders
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class ShowRequestHeaders
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Shows all the request headers sent on this particular request.

Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press, http://www.coreservlets.com/. © 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.
